title: Otto's Irresistible Dance
content:
Otto's Irresistible Dance Level 6 Enchantment Spell Cause a creature to start dancing, making it unable to take actions or move. Its attackers have Advantage on Attack Rolls. The dancer has Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and Dexterity Saving Throws. 10 turns 9m WIS Save Concentration Action Level 6 Spell Slot
